Audio.Author: Sidnei Dantas
Audio.Comments: Excited bird, in a mixed-flock. Long song incomplete, unfortunatelly.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Momotus momota,Thamnophilus schistaceus,Grallaria varia,Thamnomanes caesius,Thamnophilus amazonicus,Trogon viridis,Hylophilus hypoxanthus,Myrmoborus leucophrys,Myiarchus tuberculifer
